Race.SpecificTitle: PW Proposition -- 1/2% Sales Tax Ext. & Reded. - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Sales Tax Extension and Rededication)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of West Feliciana, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to levy and collect a tax of one-half of one percent (1/2%) (the "Tax") upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the Parish, all as defined by law (an estimated $1,460,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for an additional ten (10) years, from and after May 1, 2020 and shall the proceeds of the Tax heretofore and hereafter collected be used as follows: 75% for acquiring, constructing, maintaining, operating and/or improving buildings, facilities and equipment for the West Feliciana Parish Hospital and 25% for repairing, maintaining and improving public roads and bridges in the Parish, including the acquisition, maintenance and/or operation of equipment and materials for said purpose?

Race.SpecificTitle: Sales Tax District No. 1 -- 1/2% Sales Tax Ext. & Reded. - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Sales Tax District No. 1 Proposition
(Sales Tax Extension and Rededication)
Race.FullText: Shall Sales Tax District No. 1 of the Parish of West Feliciana, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to levy and collect a tax of one-half of one percent (1/2%) (the "Tax") upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the District, all as defined by law (an estimated $905,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for an additional ten (10) years, from and after July 1, 2020 and shall the proceeds of the Tax heretofore and hereafter collected be used as follows: 75% for acquiring, constructing, maintaining, operating and/or improving buildings, facilities and equipment for the West Feliciana Parish Hospital and 25% for repairing, maintaining and improving public roads and bridges in the Parish, including the acquisition, maintenance and/or operation of equipment and materials for said purpose?
